title: Biden Biggest Blunder Yet (Ep 1329)
description:
In this episode, I address the single most damaging thing Joe Biden has said during his entire campaign. It should concern every single person who heard it. I also discuss a troubling weekend interview where new information was released about Hillary Clinton. 

News Picks:

Are the Spygate investigators getting ready to charge John Brennan?


Another suspicious angle in the Jeffrey Epstein case. 


Kellyanne Conway is leaving the White House.


Facebook is trying to stop the spread of some viral content. 

DeBlasio is burning New York City to the ground. 

Kim Jong Un reportedly in a coma as his sister takes control. 


An older piece about the suspicious connections between Victor Pinchuk and the Spygate players.
